doc.field: Qtr ends Jan 31 Oper shr loss 24 cts vs loss 19 cts Oper loss 1,096,332 vs loss 794,711 Revs 803,085 vs 442,420 Six mths Oper shr loss 53 cts vs loss 43 cts Oper loss 2,375,844 vs loss 1,741,437 Revs 1,471,257 vs 768,683 NOTE: Prior year excludes losses from discontinued operations of 13 cts per share in the quarter and 17 cts per share in the year.
